name: network-engineer
description: Network engineering plugin for architecting and implementing Linux networking infrastructure with support for various networking stacks, FRR routing, and SONiC NOS

agents.name: network-orchestrator
agents.description: Main orchestrator for coordinating network engineering tasks across specialized agents

agents.name: interfaces-config-generator
agents.description: Generates /etc/network/interfaces configuration files for Debian/Ubuntu systems

agents.name: netplan-config-generator
agents.description: Generates netplan YAML configuration files for modern Ubuntu/Debian systems

agents.name: network-architecture-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews network architecture plans and configuration files for errors and best practices

agents.name: network-security-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews network architecture and configurations for security issues based on NIST standards

agents.name: frr-config-generator
agents.description: Generates FRR (Free Range Routing) configuration files for BGP, OSPF, IS-IS, and other routing protocols

agents.name: sonic-engineer
agents.description: Works with SONiC Network Operating System for configuration generation and operational commands

commands.name: design-network
commands.description: Design a network architecture with orchestrated planning

commands.name: review-network-config
commands.description: Review network configuration files for errors and best practices

commands.name: review-network-security
commands.description: Security review of network architecture based on NIST standards

commands.name: sonic-config
commands.description: Work with SONiC NOS configuration and operations
